AT.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns
AT.description: Schlüpfe in die Rolle eines jungen Stadtbewohners, der sich schon immer ein Leben auf dem Land erträumt hat. Dein Traum führt dich auf ein riesiges Grundstück, das nur darauf wartet, bepflanzt, dekoriert und als Weideland verwendet zu werden. Dein neuer Bauernhof liegt in der Nähe dreier verschiedener Städte. Westown mit seinen Kühen und Korallen hat alles, was das Siedlerherz begehrt. Gleich daneben liegt Lulukoko, ein warmes, freundliches Paradies, das es mit jeder tropischen Insel aufnehmen kann. Und zu guter Letzt wäre da noch Tsuyukusa, ein traditionelles fernöstliches Dorf. Freunde dich mit den Einwohner an und hilf ihnen dabei, ihre Städte zu verbessern, dann verbinde dich lokal oder über das Internet mit anderen Spielern zum Plaudern und zum Tauschen nützlicher Items. Lege Felder an, züchte süße Tiere, werde zum bekannten Koch oder Modekenner und erlebe eine romantische Beziehung mit einem deiner Nachbarn.

movies.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns - Trailer zum Verkaufsstart
Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns: Übersichtstrailer

AU.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns
AU.description: Take on the role of a young city slicker who has always wished for a life on the farm. Your dream leads you to a huge plot of open land just ready to be filled with crops, livestock, decorations, and more. Your new farm is at the crossroads of three different towns. Westown, with its cows and corrals, has everything the classic frontier settler needs. Right next door is Lulukoko Town, a warm, friendly paradise to rival any tropical island. Rounding out the neighborhood is Tsuyukusa, a traditional Far Eastern village. Become friends with the residents and help them improve their towns, then connect to other farmers like you, locally or via internet, to chat and trade useful items. Grow crops, raise adorable pets, become a renowned chef or fashionista, and even discover romance with the locals.

BG.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns

Grow crops, raise adorable pets, become a renowned chef or fashionista, and even discover romance with the locals.

movies.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns - Launch Trailer
Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns: Overview Trailer

BE.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns
BE.description: Mettez-vous dans la peau d'un jeune citadin ayant toujours rêvé de vivre à la ferme. Votre rêve vous conduira jusqu'à une immense parcelle de terrain vierge, qui n'attend plus que d'être couverte de cultures, de bétail, d'éléments paysagers et plus encore. Votre nouvelle ferme se situe au carrefour de trois villes très différentes : Westown, avec ses vaches et ses enclos, possède tout ce dont un pionnier a besoin. Juste à côté, Lulukoko est une ville sympathique et chaleureuse, digne de rivaliser avec n'importe quel paradis tropical. Pour finir, Tsuyukusa est un village traditionnel du Levant. Sympathisez avec les habitants et aidez-les à améliorer leur ville, puis connectez-vous aux autres fermiers grâce au mode multijoueur local ou via Internet, afin de discuter et d'échanger des objets utiles. Faites pousser des cultures, élevez d'adorables animaux de compagnie, devenez un chef célèbre ou une fashionista, et tombez même amoureux.

Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns: Overview Trailer

ES.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns
ES.description: Ponte en la piel de un joven urbanita que sueña con vivir en su propia granja. Tus sueños se hacen finalmente realidad y acabas en un enorme terreno listo para cultivar, criar ganado y muchas más cosas. Tu nueva granja está a igual distancia de tres pueblos diferentes. Westown, con sus vacas y corrales, tiene todo lo que un colono en terreno fronterizo necesita para su nueva granja. El siguiente pueblo es Lulukoko Town, un cálido lugar que podría competir con cualquier paraíso tropical. Y el tercer pueblo es Tsuyukusa, un tradicional pueblo al estilo del Lejano Oriente. Hazte amigo de los residentes de los pueblos y ayúdalos a mejorarlos. Establece contacto con otros granjeros como tú, localmente u online, para charlar e intercambiar artículos útiles. Cultiva la tierra, cría adorables mascotas y conviértete en reputado cocinero o fashionista… ¡hasta puede que descubras el amor con alguno de los habitantes de los pueblos!

IT.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns
IT.description: Mettiti nei panni di un giovane di città che ha sempre sognato di vivere in una fattoria. Seguendo i tuoi sogni hai trovato un grande appezzamento di terra che potrai seminare, adibire a pascolo e molto altro. La tua nuova fattoria si trova fra tre città molto diverse tra loro. Westown, con i suoi ranch, è il classico insediamento di frontiera. Lulukoko Town è un caldo paradiso tropicale. L'ultima, Tsuyukusa, è un tipico villaggio dell'Estremo Oriente. Fai amicizia con gli abitanti e aiutali a migliorare le loro città, poi collegati con altri fattori come te, in locale o online, per chattare e scambiare oggetti utili. Semina i campi, cresci adorabili animali, diventa un cuoco o un esperto di moda e intreccia addirittura relazioni romantiche con gli abitanti del luogo.

NL.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns
NL.description: Neem de rol aan van een stadskind dat altijd al droomde van een leven op het platteland. Volg je droom naar een enorm stuk open land dat klaar is om gevuld te worden met gewassen, vee, versieringen en meer. Je nieuwe boerderij bevindt zich op de kruising tussen drie dorpen. Westown, met zijn koeien en stallen, heeft alles te bieden voor de klassieke kolonist. Vlak ernaast vind je Lulukoko, een warm en vriendelijk paradijs dat je helemaal in tropische sferen brengt. Het derde stadje is Tsuyukusa, in de traditionele stijl van het verre oosten. Sluit vriendschap met de bewoners en help ze hun omgevingen te verbeteren. Je kunt via een lokale verbinding of internet ook contact leggen met andere spelers om te chatten en handige voorwerpen uit te wisselen. Verbouw gewassen, verzorg schattige huisdieren, word een beroemde chefkok of fashionista, en ga romantische relaties aan met de bevolking.

movies.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns - Releasetrailer

movies.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns - Launch Trailer
Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns: Overview Trailer

PT.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns
PT.description: Joga na pele de um jovem habituado à grande cidade que sempre desejou uma vida calma no campo. O teu sonho leva-te até a um vasto terreno aberto, pronto para ser povoado com plantações, gado, decorações e muito mais. A tua nova quinta encontra-se no cruzamento de três povoações. Westown, com as suas vacas e currais, tem tudo aquilo de que um agricultor precisa. Junto a ele está a Lulukoko Town, um paraíso acolhedor e amigável com um ambiente comparável ao de uma ilha tropical. Finalmente, a Tsuyukusa é uma aldeia tradicional do Extremo Oriente. Cria amizade com os residentes, ajuda-os a melhorar as suas povoações e liga-te depois a outros agricultores através de uma ligação local ou da Internet para conversarem e trocarem objetos úteis. Podes fazer plantações, criar animais de estimação, tornar-te num cozinheiro ou "fashionista" de renome e quem sabe até desenvolver uma relação amorosa com um dos residentes!

movies.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns - Trailer de lançamento
Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns: Trailer de apresentação

RU.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Вы окажетесь в роли молодого городского жителя, который всегда хотел жить на ферме. Ваша мечта приводит вас на огромный участок земли, где совсем скоро появятся дом, поля, домашние животные и т. д. С вашей фермы можно быстро добраться до трех различных городов. Весттаун предложит абсолютно все, что может понадобиться переселенцу в новых землях. Город Лулукоко напоминает приветливый тропический рай. А расположенный неподалеку город Цуюкуса — вылитая копия традиционной азиатской деревни. Подружитесь с жителями этих городов и оказывайте им посильную помощь, а также наладьте связи с другими фермерами в локальном режиме или по Сети, чтобы обмениваться полезными предметами. Занимайтесь сельским хозяйством, выращивайте милых питомцев, станьте знаменитым поваром и укрепляйте отношения с местными жителями.

movies.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns - трейлер к выходу игры
Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns: Обзорный ролик

SE.name: Story of Seasons: Trio of Towns
SE.description: Take on the role of a young city slicker who has always wished for a life on the farm. Your dream leads you to a huge plot of open land just ready to be filled with crops, livestock, decorations, and more. Your new farm is at the crossroads of three different towns. Westown, with its cows and corrals, has everything the classic frontier settler needs. Right next door is Lulukoko Town, a warm, friendly paradise to rival any tropical island. Rounding out the neighborhood is Tsuyukusa, a traditional Far Eastern village. Become friends with the residents and help them improve their towns, then connect to other farmers like you, locally or via internet, to chat and trade useful items. Grow crops, raise adorable pets, become a renowned chef or fashionista, and even discover romance with the locals.
